title: 280 - MFM Guest Host Picks #3: Billy Jensen
description:
Throughout the months of June and July, Exactly Right family members will be guest hosting My Favorite Murder! Each week a guest host will pick their favorite stories from Karen and Georgia.

Today's episode is hosted by Billy Jensen, co-host of Jensen & Holes: The Murder Squad on Exactly Right. Billy covers the stories of The Dexter Copycat Murder (Episode 163) and the Murder of Bonnie Lee Bakley (Episode 112).
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
